cultural_facts: France is famous for its cuisine, including cheese, wine, and pastries.
The Eiffel Tower in Paris is one of the most visited monuments in the world.
France has the most time zones of any country in the world.
The French Revolution began in 1789 and changed the course of history.
Bastille Day, celebrated on July 14th, is France's national holiday.
